THIS_IS_STATION_YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH_D.message: Aquí {station}. No teniu prous diners per pagar la taxa d'amarratge de {fee}.

THIS_IS_STATION_YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH_L.message: This is {station}. You do not have enough money for your landing fee of {fee}.

WELCOME_ABOARD_STATION_FEE_DEDUCTED.description: Station welcome message, docking in orbit
WELCOME_ABOARD_STATION_FEE_DEDUCTED.message: Benvingut a bord de {station}. Us hem deduït la taxa d'amarratge de {fee}.

WELCOME_TO_STATION_FEE_DEDUCTED.description: Station welcome message, ground station landing
WELCOME_TO_STATION_FEE_DEDUCTED.message: Benvingut a {station}. Us hem deduït la taxa d'aterratge de {fee}.
